title: China. Part 1. History and culture
brief_description: Descibes China’s early history, the war with Japan, the revolution and rise of communism. Shows modern industry and transport, the city of Shanghai, Chinese theatre, story telling and musical performances. Edited from the feature documentary ‘China!’
